Question
========
A knowledge test on alcohol contains 20 items and is administered to 202 high school students. The variable [total score] gives the total correct scores. Gender (0 = woman; 1 = man) and alcohol use (0 = very often; 1 = often; 2 = sometimes = 3.never) are also included in the dataset. 

Calculate the percentile scores. What is the percentage of students with a total score of 16.0 or lower? Give the rounded percentage. (no decimals) 

Open the dataset below to answer this question:

**Download** [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-403-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-403-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The percentage of students with a total score of 16.0 or lower is 88% (percentiles can be calculated using rank cases).
